content.text:
# Opinion polling for the 2019 Tunisian presidential election

Polling for the 2019 Tunisian presidential election, which took place on 15 September 2019, with a runoff on 13 October 2019.
Second round
Polls

|data-sort-value="2019-07-25" |25 July 2019
|colspan="21" |The Independent High Authority for Elections moves up the election and runoff dates from 17 November 2019 and 24 November 2019 to 15 September 2019 and 22 September 2019 respectively in order to find a successor in accordance with the 90-day interim presidency period called for by the Constitution
|-
|-
|
|data-sort-value="2019-07-25" |25 July 2019
|colspan="21" |Beji Caid Essebsi passes away in office at the age of 92; Mohamed Ennaceur sworn in as Interim President of Tunisia on a 90-day interim basis
|-
|
|data-sort-value="2019-07-23" |23 July 2019
|colspan="21" |Abdelkarim Zbidi announces that he will not run for the election
|-
|

|colspan="21" |Electoral period begins; no further polls are allowed
